website_summaries.verdict: Roomy bags that are easy to stash and carry. Suitable for carrying and storing a variety of produce.
pros: Made of lightweight nylon mesh material that's transparent so you can easily see the contents
Large bags can accommodate larger quantities and big items
cons: Dye on the colored fabric at the top of the bags fades when you wash them
Fabric may fray with heavy use/washings

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these produce bags! I was getting so frustrated every time I went to the grocery store coming home with more and more plastic! Now I can get 1 onion without feeling wasteful! They are generously sized and even have pull tabs to keep the bags shut! I think they are fabulous! If you found my review helpful, please click Yes below! :)
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of mesh bags I’ve ordered, I do really like them rather than going through so many plastic produce bags at the grocery store! I did mark down one star because it did come in a plastic bag - I feel like the target audience to this product is wanting to consume less plastic so doing away with the unnecessary plastic packaging would make it even better.
customer_reviews.author: I. K.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, re-usable veggie bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great— strong, durable, lightweight, very large, and easy to clean. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DhyffdK

customer_reviews.title: Great for people wanting to make a difference
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, these bags get their job done. Pros: - draw string (no more twisting the top of my plastic bag to try and secure it) - mesh material - cute colors - sturdy feeing - no. More. Plastic. Cons: - obviously not as see thru as plastic, but the pros definitely outweigh the cons. I saw some older reviews that mentioned it came in a plastic bag but mine came in a recyclable paper box and that was it! Great improvement to reduce plastic waste. Overall. An amazing product and I’m happy (:
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but a little opaque
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept of these bags and especially that I won't be bringing so much plastic bag film into my house that I then have to return to the store to recycle. I bought 2 sets. The cinchers work well. My one complaint is they're not that easy to see through so the clerk has to open each one to see the code on the produce unless she can tell what it is through the bag.
customer_reviews.author: HeyCher

customer_reviews.title: Great Multipurpose Bags!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these bags!!! The see through mesh facilitates the clerk weighing and identifying produce without needing to open the bag. These bags are large enough to handle 6-8 apples. I initially bought them for produce, but ended up using them for multiple purposes. The soft but durable mesh is even suitable for use as a laundry bag for delicates. With that said, these are washable. The darker colored materials did bleed slightly when laundered so cold water and like colors is recommended. Great way to cut down on plastic and to give your produce some fresh air.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sagisi

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these bags.... my co workers every year orders from my son thanksgiving book and i wanted to present their orders in a nice bag not a plastic bags and these were perfect they cannot stop complimenting me on the presentation and it fix the boxes of cheese cake, apple pie etc just fine.... these mesh bags are an all time alround bags.... my friends can’t wait to order some bags also....I must say these bags exceed my expectation.... very strong and very well made and big enough to hold tons of stuff .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrapped in plastic
customer_reviews.text: Happy to get my bags, and so far better than the previous ones I purchased. However, they arrived wrapped in cellophane, which is really unnecessary and pretty much the reason I’m buying reusable bags, to stop the making of plastics, especially wasteful packaging and one time use produce bags. For this reason I give the product a thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie LaFontaine

customer_reviews.title: The draw string is almost impossible to close.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two brands of these at the same time. These are going back. Yes, hard to see through but worse yet is they are impossible to close. The drawstring sticks and I tried each one in the order and could not get even one of them to close completely. Not what I want to do while grocery shopping - fighting the bag. The other brand is much simpler, you can see through them and they are nearly weightless. We do pay for the weight of produce, after all. I am surprised to see that so many people like these.
customer_reviews.author: Denise A. Cullen

customer_reviews.title: color wash off on to bag after washing
customer_reviews.text: As shown on pic ..after washing ...thread starts coming out as well...
customer_reviews.author: Lulucas

customer_reviews.title: Fruit/vegetable reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: Look nice, love the colors at top HOWEVER it’s kind of hard to close the bags, when the string is pulled it doesn’t bunch up together to close, I had to push it together to close each bag, the ends of the bags are not sewn very securely, I think these are not worth the price, I have found similar bags for half the price here on amazon that I prefer to try out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a quest to reduce the amount of soft plastic that I use. Recycle, and all those plastic bags in the produce section mounted up. No more produce bags with these. I leave them open when checking out, just like the plastic ones were, so that the cashier can see and count/weigh. Easy to tie when bagging to secure. Really like them and they are durable. Also, can be washed. Highly recommend for anyone trying to cut down on plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and durable
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great, and are durable even with heavy produce. Make sure to wash the top before you get the rest wet, since the color does bleed a bit (I think the instructions mention that as well). They're fairly lightweight, so they don't throw the scale off too much.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Good addition if you are getting away from plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bags. I use them every time I purchase produce at the grocery store. The bag material is strong and can easily hold heavy objects like apples and oranges. They are lightweight so I don't mind just keeping my produce in the bags when I weigh them at checkout. The pullstring and lock are secure when closed. I also like the color variety for fun (orange for oranges, green for brussell sprouts, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: T. Engle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Alternative to Plastic Produce Bags Initially
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad to find these mesh bags to use for produce. I had not been using the flimsy plastic bags grocery stores have available in produce departments, but baggers kept sneaking them onto my produce purchases. They're clearly marked with the bag weight, which makes it easy for checkout people weighing my produce. I liked the locking drawstrings. Unfortunately, as soon as they were washed, the mesh started to fray, and the ends wrapped themselves around the pull cords, making it nearly impossible to close them. It's a great idea, but this particular solution isn't working out well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Beth ATop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Moving toward zero waste
customer_reviews.text: I'm not there yet, but I'm making progress. I received a set of these as a gift from my daughter, and I came back to buy another set to share the love with my son. I use these bags in the produce department at our grocery store for items that would normally go into a disposable plastic bag. They are excellent for apples, oranges, onions, potatos, and bell peppers. If you are buying greens such as lettuce or broccoli that require a certain moisture level (anything under the sprayers) you will need to use the item that day or transfer them into an airtight container to store in your refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: kathie a

customer_reviews.title: Sensible and sturdy alternative to plastic produce bags.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that someone came up with a sensible alternative to those plastic produce bags. Not only are the plastic ones terrible for the environment, but they are also hard to open and they don't feel very sturdy when I am trying to open them and put produce inside of them. These reusable bags are light weight, so they don't add to the cost when the produce is weighed. Even if they did add a few cents , to me it would be worth it because they are better for the environment. The only problem I will have with them is remembering to take them with me to the store.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wood

customer_reviews.title: My favorite purchase in the last 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I have read, checked on and tried other bags who stated they were number one. I find these are durable, a perfect size and they arrived just as i was told. I am sending my daughters a set. They are very health minded, these will enable us to bring our vegetables and fruits hime without using more plastic. We all know the situation of our world. I use the bags for my shopping as above and to wash my delicates. There are many ways to use these superior bags, use your imagination. I will buy another set and give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Keep those re-usable bags
customer_reviews.text: In this time of the coronavirus, our grocery shopping habits of bringing our own bags (and hopefully re-usable bags) for produce -- are being temporarily shelved as stores request we use the plastic paper bags they provide. In time we will be able to return to our new good shopping habits and I'm glad to have these re-usable bags for the fruit and veggies. So wash them and fold them up and have them ready for the day coming when we will happily tote them to our local farmer's market or grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: G. J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for reducing waste
customer_reviews.text: When we started to go zero-waste the easiest change to make was to stop using plastic produce bags at the store. These bags are a great size, they have a drawstring for closing them, and the see-through mesh allows cashiers to see what’s inside (and to read those ridiculous produce stickers that are on everything). The one thing I don’t love is that the bags snag on things like stems or other things in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Looks home-made
customer_reviews.text: These eco bags really have a home-made look to them. Im on the fence about that fact. The thread is white upon the colored tops and this is likely what gives it a somewhat off putting appearance. The Tare weight is NOT lableled on the bags so this too was disappointing. If you like the crafty/homemade look these bags will do that trick. These are 3 star bags to me but I give them 4 stars because the price is low for a generous quantity.
customer_reviews.author: NinjaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these bags! These are so easy to take to the grocery store. There are so many bags and they each have a different colored rim. They are light yet sturdy and the only flaw I can think of is that the closures don’t glide very easily along the string. However they’re not a nuisance, just take a tiny bit of extra finger strength. I have washed these just once so far and they held up well and did not shrink. Previous reviews mentioned that these bags came in plastic packaging, however the company must have made some changes. Mine came in a recyclable box and that was it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little bags, all the same size, very bulky
customer_reviews.text: The bags are made of what looks to be a recycled plastic. However the tie at the top could be a little tighter, I’ve noticed when I buy grapes or raisins they don’t close the whole way and I lose things. The bags are all the same size, it would if been nice to have 2-3 different sizes of bags depending on the size of produce you buy. But you’re limited on what you can put in the bags because they’re all one size. My only regret to buying them is they take up a lot of space, they’re very bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Only downside, not scanner friendly
customer_reviews.text: As the headline says, they're great bags, well-made, sturdy, and breathable. But, when checking out with one's produce in them, the labels can't be read by scanning devices. In fact, it's difficult to make out what's on the labels if you try to input the identification code by hand other than to take the item out of the bag to read the label. My hope was to avoid using the plastic bags provided in the produce section.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: They work awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut down on the amount of plastic I use when I go to the supermarket...and then Coronavirus hit, and supermarkets won't let you bring anything from home. Oh well. Meanwhile we are using them for our veggies when we get home, and they work great. I like them so much I bought more for my mother and mother in law. Once it's allowed again, I'll definitely be using these to carry fruits and veggies from the supermarket. They're well made - sturdy, washable, well worth having. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia M. Klinger

customer_reviews.title: Try a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these reusable mesh bags because I hate the plastic bags from the store. After hand washing them, which was a pain and hanging them to dry I noticed that the colors on the fabric tops have bled and are super stiff. Maybe after using them the fabric will soften. Not my best purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LINDSAY

customer_reviews.title: Great veg/fruit bags
customer_reviews.text: Was shopping for veggies and the plastic bags would not open. I didn't want to wet my finger so I just continued to get more frustrated by the minute. I made up my mind right then and there I was going to order these bags that I had been looking at. Well then came and they are 100 times better than I had thought they would be....So no more plastic for me....thanks for such a great product and please stay safe....
customer_reviews.author: Becky Holzhaus

customer_reviews.title: As Described, Great for Produce!
customer_reviews.text: *Updated review: the plastic cap that tightens the bag breaks. After 6+ months of use and wash in the laundry, I'm now unable to close the bag. Giving 3 stars as I got my use out of them but would not buy again or recommend. ---- These are exactly as described. They are great for grocery shopping, while making you feel good about reducing the number of bags you use! WASH BEFORE FIRST USE. I put them in washing machine but did not dry them. They quickly air dried and then were good to use. I will put them in the washing machine again without thinking twice.
customer_reviews.author: DCSuds

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are as described and love them for my produce. Several sizes, more than enough for my weekly shopping. I like that the produce sticker can be scanned through bag. They are airy so I don’t have to remove from bag if I don’t want to when storing at home. I wash mine in soap water and have not put in washing machine so I don’t know how they would hold up being washed that way. I’ve had mine only about a month so have used/washed only 4 times.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: The best produce bags you will find
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for reusable produce bags as my next step in being more kind to my earth. These bags caught my attention since they were colorful and looked very sturdy. You won't be disappointed! These bags are made really well with very high quality materials. The drawstrings are large and so easy to both cinch and loosen. The bags are also plenty big for apples or potatoes. I am very happy with my purchase and will feel sort of haughty in the market with my own handsome reusable bags. Be the first in your store, too!
customer_reviews.author: Niki Matthews

customer_reviews.title: A good tool for "Reduce"
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to cut down on the use of single use plastics, and these take the place of those flimsy produce bags in the store. Even if I know *I* am not the main problem in the world, I want to take steps to be a more responsible consumer. I have been using these for several weeks now and they are holding up well. I would not shove a pineapple in one - prickly things catch at the mesh - but they are great for smooth skinned items like most of your fruits and veggies. The grocery store cashiers even liked them!
customer_reviews.author: AZC

customer_reviews.title: Environmentally friendly - fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: An exceptional product:) ! Not only are the great for the environment, but it keeps your produce fresh for at least 3x longer. Plastic bags from the grocery store keep the moisture in and help your produce rot quicker. I will be purchasing another set for myself and a set for my friend:) Everyone should use these. We have enough plastics ruining our environment and killing our wildlife.
customer_reviews.author: dylan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The product came as described. I bought it for my mom as a part of her birthday gift because our local grocery store is going plastic-free. The bags are light enough that they shouldn't add any extra weight to scales for weighing, but are also very sturdy in how they're built. The mesh seems like it would be difficult to break but is also soft enough that is shouldn't damage any sensitive fruits or veggies. Overall a great investment - would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Not using plastic bags that get thrown into landfills
customer_reviews.text: I used my reusable produce bags for the first time this week. It felt SO GOOD to use a product that won't be thrown away and can be reused time and time again. I wanted to yell to everyone in the store, "Look what I'm doing!" but I contained myself! So proud of the little bit I can do to help stop waste!
customer_reviews.author: A. Holley

customer_reviews.title: Better than plastic
customer_reviews.text: Kinda too heavy with the plastic slider. Checker has too open each bag to scan or check #’s. It’s worth it though to not use plastic. I do wish they were about 2 inches wider and longer. Update 5-4-19 I am really starting too like these bags. I haven’t noticed an increase in money at the market, so not really that heavy. I’ve been using these bags for under garment protection in the washer & they hold 2 bras, & undies and no catching on any other cloths as well as veggies. The bags really take a beating & still no rips or tears.
customer_reviews.author: Eryk

customer_reviews.title: Sustainable alternative to plastic produce bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are a great alternative to plastic produce bags. The mesh is fairly large, so these can't be used for bulk section items or small things like snow peas, but they work just fine for most produce. I just throw them in the washing machine when they get dirty. They also allow for airflow, which can help some produce last longer. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No more waste on veg bags
customer_reviews.text: I take these bags to the store and fill with my vegetables take them home, rinse and clean them in the bags, they stay in the bags and are fresh until im ready to use them. The lg bag I use for my grandsons bath toys. After they are through with the bath I put the toys in the bag and rinse with soapy water and then let them hang in the bag to dry. It's very easy, the only problem is the kids like the bag as much as the toys. I may be buying more bags. Thks
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Save our planet!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are the greatest to take in stores for produce or use them for purchases. Anything we can do to cut back on plastic is great! I buy a lot of loose produce as I am a vegan. So this product really is terrific. There are many other ways to use them, but I just got them a few days ago. From now on, I will always have them with me when shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get your produce without the guilt of killing sea turtles!
customer_reviews.text: The stitching for the colorful border around the top of the bag had gone into the draw string so I couldn't fully close these. After a couple yanks I popped the stitches and now they work great! The borders are still attached just fine. At first I thought I would need more than 5 but these can hold plenty. Like when the giant honey-crisp apples are on sale and you buy 7 they all fit in the bag and it closes. Cashiers can read the numbers on the produce just fine, haven't had any complaints only compliments. No more plastic! Yay! Save the planet!
customer_reviews.author: Vulpix

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These bags are a great size - big enough to hold apples, oranges, napa cabbage or whatever you are buying. They are durable and well made. I gave only 4 stars because they aren't as easy to 'see through' as I had hoped. Cashiers sometimes need to ask because they can't see the little stickers on the produce. However, I wouldn't hesitate to buy these again and would give them as a gift because they are well made
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Reusable bags are a great idea, and these mesh bags fit the bill well!
customer_reviews.text: Though in thgeime of Covid 19, store will not let me use my own bags. I wait for the day when I can use these when buying vegetables again. Hard to tell, but I believe that these bags were made in the USA, and the is one thing I strive for when shopping. The Mesh works well, the bags are sturdy, they wash well, and they were a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: good alternative to plastics.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bags - I was looking for something to bring to the grocery store with my reusable shopping bags, so I wouldn't have to use those super thin staticky ones in the produce section. Eliminate our dependence on plastics! Well, every tiny bit helps right? The bags don't weigh much, so I don't feel like I'm paying extra, and I like the various sizes. Only 4 stars because I'm finding them a bit difficult to close all the way. But most foods are big enough that they can't fall out of the remaining hole anyway, so it's not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: J & D Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: reuse, recycle, reduce
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the reusable Washable produce bags because we have tried to reduce all plastic bag use. These work great, let produce breath, the only problem is that they weigh an ounce so it increases your cost minutely. Well worth not polluting the environment and oceans. Now if someone can tell me how to get rid of cat liter, that would be great. Right now we use kraft paper bags. Not the best solutions. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: C. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited about these bags! I’ve hated using the plastic bags at grocery stores for years and I finally broke down and bought these! The colors are fun and the material feels great! Very durable and they make me excited to pick out all the fruits and veggies! It makes me feel good knowing that I can reuse these over and over again and no longer need to feel bad about those plastic bags that are simply thrown away each time. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose well
customer_reviews.text: These work well and serve their purpose. I like the fact that you can close them to keep smaller produce from falling out. I will say that the opening can make it hard to put larger items in like different types of lettuce. Also they aren’t super durable because the mesh will catch on things and cause runs. Also- keep them from getting dirty!!!! I washed one of mine and it shrunk DRASTICALLY and is unusable. I was happy with the purchase but wouldn’t purchase again as there are other options.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Quality Assured by Liam
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love love these bags! I was someone who bought veggies so often but I ended up with a bunch of the plastic bags from the store. After sitting down and realizing how much waste I produce with plastic, I looked into reusable items and came across these mesh bags. They are made with love and care than I can guarantee Liam would approve of. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Schaar

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags, flimsy clasps
customer_reviews.text: I would give these a 5 star review if one of my clasps wasn't already broken (after the second use). The bags themselves are sturdy and good quality, but they screwed up by putting flimsy clasps on the draw string that are easily broken. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great sustainable option!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great more sustainable option than plastic produce bags. They are quite large. I was able to easily fit a large head of romaine lettuce in it with room to spare. I liked that they were color coded. I was able to match them to a reusable bag. I would love if they had a wider range of sizes though. May invest in some smaller bags.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Best idea for "being green"!
customer_reviews.text: We buy several types of produce when at a grocery store. These bags are great. We no longer have to struggle to open those plastic bags in which to put produce. And eliminating plastic bags from a landfill is the best reason. Everyone who purchases produce needs to buy these bags!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen W. Juodvalkis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I recently got really into eating fresh apples and broccoli but I absolutely HATED seeing all of those plastic bags go into the recycling. Since I got these, that waste has vanished! Because I only needed two, I took the rest home for my family to use for their shopping, since they eat a wider variety than I do. My only issue with them is that they are not machine washable and they don’t really do much in extended to the life of the food inside them. These factors together are why I took a star off the review.
customer_reviews.author: H. C.

customer_reviews.title: Environmentally Friendly
customer_reviews.text: It is important for me to try and help conserve our resources. This is a great bag for produce and light items. It can easily fit into your purse or pocket when on the go as less and less stores are using bags - a good thing! The only negative I found is that it's limited to only a half a pound in weight so it doesn't tear. Otherwise, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Reusable Produce Bags
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, durable, reusable, great size, washable, and wonderfully functional produce bags. These bags allow me to do my part for environmental concerns and cut down on waste. My reusable produce bags arrived well packed and very fast. I would DEFINITELY buy from this business again!
customer_reviews.author: Diania L. Wood

customer_reviews.title: No More Plastic, Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I love these roomy bags! I can put 2 or 3 in my medium-sized purse along with 3 parachute nylon shopping bags and I'm set. I roll them up to compact them. The only thing I would change is the somewhat bulky fabric edging, thick cord tie and toggle. It's a minor thing to this new user. They seem sturdy and I feel I could toss them in sink or washer when dirty and line dry, and they'd be good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Tosca's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great for ALL items!
customer_reviews.text: I try to use as little plastic bags as possible, but whenever I go to the market and get something small (like peppers) or something in bulk (like green beans) you pretty much have to have a bag. That or risk losing said items through cart holes or in the bottom of large reusable bags. These are perfect, they're sturdy enough to hold several large fruits, and I also won't lose my smaller/bulk items. Love these bags, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable produce bags
customer_reviews.text: I recently learned that all of us have plastic in our bodies. Even babies are born with plastic in their bodies because Mom's pass it to the fetus. It is so hard to not have plastic in your environment. The only thing you can do is to reduce how much plastic you expose yourself to. This is what sent me online to find reusable produce bags. I really like these bags because they can hold a bunch of kale or just a couple of apples. The cashiers at Whole Foods have no problem getting the codes off the produce at check out. I would highly recommend these bags.
customer_reviews.author: heather lee

customer_reviews.title: A satisfying purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are lightweight, easy to open/close, well-constructed, and attractive. I didn't think the various-colored bands at the opening were necessary, but I must admit that I like them and find them handy for identification purposes. The tare-weight tags on each were not mentioned in the product description, so were a welcome feature. I have washed them just once so far, and they have held up well, getting just a wee bit softer from that treatment. I feel so pleased about taking this small step to reduce my family's plastic bag utilization. Thank you, Naturally Sensible TM. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kato

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdy quality of these. I don't feel like sharper things, like banana stems, will be able to rip through them like with my old mesh ones. My only complaint is that the drawstring is hard to close. I have to tug at it and eventually just give up and secure it partially closed, hoping that the produce doesn't fall out. I'm not sure how to make this easier (different texture cord maybe?) but my old bags you just picked it up by the cord and it slid shut so you could secure it. I'd still buy these again because the quality is great - it will just take a little thinking to make them perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: sasamo

customer_reviews.title: I have not used these as they were too awkward ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these as they were too awkward to work with in the store and once I got home. The drawstring top part of the bag does not work smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Stop the plastic bag madness!
customer_reviews.text: I bough a set for my sister and then loved them so much I ordered a set for myself. The quality is superior to others and the mesh is great for being able to see what's in the bag. I leave them in my car so when I shop I use these beauties rather than the wasteful plastic bags at the market. People who observe me using them ask "where did you get those? What a great idea" So hopefully more people will catch on. Love, love, love my reusable Produce bags!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen N Mudurian

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and they work great! Plus they’re better to use for the environment!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I always felt guilty using the plastic bags at the grocery store so I would end up with a bunch of lose fruits and vegetables. These are great! Very nice design and easy to use and clean. Ive only had them for a few months so far but seems like they’re here to last a while. I wish I could find some better big reusable bags for all my groceries. I’ve had most of my bags for years and some of them are starting to break and I’ve had two cooler bags that I thought were very good but a year in and the handles are breaking. Definitely would buy more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I always felt so wasteful using the plastic bags at the store for produce. I like these because they are lightweight, washable, and each has a different color band (I keep the onion bag separate for onion use only). The tag on the bag lists weight (or some kind of code) so the cashier knows how much the bag weighs (so you're not charged for it). The bags are well made, but the plastic clip that keeps the drawstring closed has broken on a few of mine. The bags are still usable, so it's not too big a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh-ann Danner

customer_reviews.title: These bags are a perfect replacement for endless plastic produce bags.
customer_reviews.text: I love the strength and convenience of these bags. Not only do they keep me from using plastic produce bags at the supermarket but they are better for storing veggies in the crisper. Carrots don't get soggy in them and mushroom get some air. I've bought two sets and may get more. I strongly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Bargetzi

customer_reviews.title: Helps reduce waste and encourage healthy choices.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been getting into the habit of making pasta sauce and salsa from scratch, in order to cut down on sugar, salt, preservatives, and packaging waste. These are crucial to the last point, as those grocery store plastic bags are only good for one use, being so flimsy and difficult to untie. These make it so easy to shop for produce, and having them makes it easy to reach for the fresh food, rather than the processed stuff. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Chinese plastic
customer_reviews.text: We're trying to get away from plastic - and yes, you can reuse these, and WAY better than peeling off plastic bags at the vegetable stand (!!!) but there are mesh bags out there that are more eco-friendly overall.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hauser

customer_reviews.title: So much better than plastic bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I bring all my food home from the store and I put then in these bags and store. What I really like is that the food can get air and doesn't go bad as quickly. I really love it for my potatoes!! Great product and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered these mesh bags about a year ago. Now, when it’s challenging to get produce (and just get OUT for it), I reordered them to store everything. Sturdy, easy to keep clean and produce fresh, I feel better knowing I have an ample supply.
customer_reviews.author: DC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product for shopping!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have reused plastic & paper shopping bags for years & was extremely happy when better bags became the ‘in’ thing...these reusable PRODUCE bags are the perfect addition to my shopping cart!!! My BFF liked mine so much, I gave her half of mine and ordered more!!! LOVE that they don’t take up much room and I don’t have to mess with untying a plastic bag when I get home!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Matsumoto

customer_reviews.title: Let us as a people quit using plastic bags
customer_reviews.text: too many countries are filled with plastic bags, too many oceans have become garbage dumps, our children's children may live in a world filled with plastic if we do not stop using it now. These bags appear well made, they washed well, and they are great for produce. My goal is no more plastic bags for produce, fruit, or shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Thay Kozen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I used to have reusable bags, but of course after a while they got lost or tossed. I dragged my feet in getting new ones, but the new year inspired me to get back on (environmental) track. These bags are perfect. Sturdy, with colorful tops (much less likely to get tossed), and a weave that's open enough where the cashier doesn't have to fondle my produce to see the code sticker. I plan to buy sets of these as gifts for other members of my family (they use SO much plastic). I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L. Gengaro

customer_reviews.title: Good bags but the colors run.
customer_reviews.text: These definitely do the job, but the colorful bands at the top run like CRAZY when they get wet. Bags are now dyes and several of my reusable grocery bags were stained. Otherwise a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Yadoff

customer_reviews.title: Love these multipurpose bags.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love these bags. They arrived on time and were packaged well. They are sturdy and come in many sizes. They all keep nicely in one bag so I always have them. They are sturdy and hold a lot. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Grutzmacher

customer_reviews.title: Better than plastic
customer_reviews.text: Ever try to open one of those plastic fruit and vegetable bags. Hard to open right. That is why I decided to be more eco friendly to our environment and purchased these bags. Love them. They also keep my vegetables fresher longer in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: wicked nice bags
customer_reviews.text: Love the bags, I am trying to cut down on my use of plastic and these are perfect. However, getting a head of red leaf lettuce in one was slightly challenging but not impossible. I also quickly saved one from getting cut open with a scissor wielding husband who thought they were the plastic mesh that sometimes oranges and onions are packed in! Phew! I would definitely order more in the future should my husband succeed next time.
customer_reviews.author: pg

customer_reviews.title: problem
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used a bag the string broke. When I made a knot, the knot prevented it from closing. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Geer

customer_reviews.title: Reusable
customer_reviews.text: Received them yesterday and will use them at the food store soon. I am pleased with a reusable bag, instead of plastic throwaway bags. The bags feel sturdy, pull string for closure, washable and large enough for most vegetables or fruit. I am certain I will use them often.
customer_reviews.author: SueB

customer_reviews.title: Fan of Baby Liam
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually do reviews, but how can I resist a personal request from Baby Liam? I am working to reduce my use of plastics. My daughter recommended these bags for produce because they are mesh so the cashiers can see the contents. I have only used them once, so I think it would be unfair to comment (yet) on their durability and sturdiness, but as a person who has been home sewing for a long time, I can tell that they appear to be quite well made. I look forward to long, plastic free years of use.
customer_reviews.author: sandy grady

customer_reviews.title: Has it’s pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had done more research on these before I bought them but I’m new at trying to be more earth conscience. These bags are nice and large enough for larger items. They are durable and easily cared for. However they are made of Nylon which is plastic made from crude oil. I’m probably going to return them and get organic cotton ones. It is helpful for the environment since they are reusable and we are cutting back on the use of plastic bags. Recyclable plastic is really just using old plastic to make more plastic products. I believe we can do better.
customer_reviews.author: Indycalichick01

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Not entirely Eco-Friendly
customer_reviews.text: These bags are super cute, I love the style and I will definitely be using them all the time! The only thing that bummed me out about these "eco-friendly" produce bags was that they were delivered in plastic :-(( I'm not sure if that's something that the seller is in charge of or its something that Amazon is responsible for. If that could be fixed, that would make this product at least 4 starts for me! The bags were a little frayed when they arrived, but its no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Carl

customer_reviews.title: HELP SAVE THE OCEANS and plastic bags everywhere in our environment
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as they say in the description. Well made and light. Washable although I haven't done that, but they look like they will hold up well. Just got them about a week ago and have used them once. We like them.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Clines

customer_reviews.title: Why are you waiting! Purchase now
customer_reviews.text: These bags have changed the game of keeping my veggies fresh in the fridge. They are super easy to clean and dry on a drying rack. I love how the tops of the bags come in different colors depending on what I am using them for. You will not regret buying these and will come back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave home without these!
customer_reviews.text: These bags arrived rapidly and are exactly as described. They are durable and versatile and I plan on keeping several in the car for groceries and even one in which to keep receipts and other papers that tend to get left in a car. I may need more they are so great.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H. Akin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mesh bags !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bags, my daughter uses them for her lunch since they have a small refrigerator at her job, for all the lunch bags. This also work better because these are easy for her to see which is her lunch instead of a plastic bag or lunch bag. She received a lot of compliments from co-worker. And was asked where she purchased them. Of course we gave you a high recommendation. We will ill be purchasing more products. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: olga yglecias

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these produce bags. They are large and great quality. I’ve used them countless times already at the grocery and feel so much better not using those flimsy plastic bags. Loved them so much I bought five to give as gifts for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Rhu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative to icky plastic bags
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of having produce bags that people haven't put their grubby hands on or sneezed around them. Plus I get some sense of social responsibility not putting more plastic garbage into the world.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Help save the planet!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. Nice mesh, good draw string for closing, easy to take to supermarkets. I feel they will wash well. They are a great way to reduce the number of plastic bags used in the veggie department.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: GreatBags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. Thank you to this amazing family for having these available to buy. I’m really working to reduce my carbon footprint with plastics. I recommend these bags to anyone who’s also conscientious about the planet’s plight.
customer_reviews.author: Janet A. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Best Fruit and Vegetable bags Ever
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Why fumble with those thin plastic bags. These have made my life so much easier. Saves me time and my patience when getting my fruit and veggies. Totally washable and reusable.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I love these produce bags
customer_reviews.text: I never shop without these produce bags. I love how durable they are and how I'm NOT using a plastic bag! I've been using my own bags for years now and I'm thrilled to have these produce bags too.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Blair

customer_reviews.title: I recommend, 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: It beats wasting plastic produce bags at the grocery store. I use mine ALL THE TIME. People always ask me about them too, I’m glad people are starting to see the effects single-use plastic harms our environment They are easy to use, light weight, sturdy, and machine washable .
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday H.

customer_reviews.title: Best reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: I looked around and these were by far the most reviewed and highest rated bags I could find, and what we received fits the bill. We have been using these for a couple months or so and have had no issue with grocery stores or the bags themselves. There is a good size tag (top side) with the tare weight for the clerk to read and adjust the scale, almost every time the clerk has said "these are the best/nice/great bags, where did you get them. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bostic

customer_reviews.title: Bags don't keep produce crisp!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are useless to store vegetables! I put lettuce in one, Swiss chard in another and the contents were limp/soggy in two days! Broccoli lasted slightly longer. All had been put in the drawer meant for produce. The only thing these are good for are hard -skinned fruits, but who needs bags for them in the fruit drawer in frig? Terrible product!
customer_reviews.author: dhw

customer_reviews.title: Quality Reusable Produce Bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are exactly as promised; quality made and made in the USA by a family-run small business. I could see the different between these and others I purchased a while back. They are sturdier and hold up well in the wash. The draw strings are also quality made. Great product - I encourage anyone considering a purchase of reusable produce bags to purchase from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these bags. I bought them as lunch bags for my fiance and they're great! I can make up all his lunches for the week and then he brings me them back at the end of the week. They're been really sturdy and are easily large enough for big bunches of lettuce and such. Will definitely be buying more to use for actual produce. I also love that they can be easily tossed in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: bar codes do not scan
customer_reviews.text: I like the bags and was hoping they would replace all the produce bags I use from the grocery. Unfortunately, even though a reviewer said the bar codes can be scanned through the mesh bags, that was not the case at my Kroger store. I probably won't use them much now.
customer_reviews.author: LifelongReader

customer_reviews.title: I love these bags!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much!! I get so many compliments when I go to the store! large enough to fit 5+ large ears of corn, they are super durable too! I just recommend, not storing your produce in the fridge INSIDE the Bags because they can get kinda funny/grody; Though, that bring me to my next point, they are super easy to wash, and are indeed washing machine safe!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Chiarella

customer_reviews.title: Produce Bag better than Plastic!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect solution to the plastic bags for produce at the grocery store. No one can get the bags open so let’s use this option which is better for our environment anyway! Easy to use and strong enough to work!!! No more loose fruit rolling around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for helping our landfills!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a dedicated recycler for more than 40 years and truly appreciate your help in making our world cleaner. I love not using the grocery stores' plastic bags! I want our precious planet to be habitable for my five grandchildren and your sweet children.
customer_reviews.author: AEH 1947

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and HUGE capacity
customer_reviews.text: My state will be banning single use plastic bags in the near future, so I wanted to buy these ahead of time to see how they work for me. I used them for the first time today and found that they hold a lot and they’re super light weight. The cashier even complimented them! The only problem I had was that the drawstring didn’t pull the whole way, leaving a gap that produce could fall out of if the bags were to tip over at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Super bad a** I’m really trying to convert into being more eco friendly and this is just a small thing you can do. Especially when you live in CA and you already have to bring you own bags.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Odle

customer_reviews.title: No problems at checkout!
customer_reviews.text: We live in a no-plastic-bag city and always recycle our produce bags, but I wanted to make the jump to reusable produce bags as well. The people checking us out at the grocery store always comment on these bags, how they love them! We've never had anyone have to open them and remove produce to see the code. The only thing to watch out for is, if they get wet, the colored band across the top definitely bleeds. Might want to wash before using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Reusable Produce Bags The Original Eco - Friendly See Through and Washable Soft Premium Lightweight Nylon Mesh Large 12"X14" Set of 5 (Red, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple) By Naturally Sensible
feature_bullets: ♦ ADD a SPLASH of COLOR ♦ – Being Eco-friendly has never been so stylish with our Natural Earth Tone Colored, Washable and Reusable Produce Bags | No more boring bags when you use these cute tote bags while shopping at your favorite and best organic supermarket, organic store, health food shops, organic market, and natural foods shop.

♦ STRONG DURABLE NYLON MESH ♦ - These see through, lightweight mesh bags are made to last. Unlike cheap tote bags, these mesh bags will hold together under all normal conditions. Save money and time, if you’re in the market to buy reusable see through, mesh bags choose ones of high quality. Spending a little more up front, will save more money in the long run.

♦ FOLDABLE CONVENIENCE ♦ - Easily Portable, Trouble Free and Hassle Free when bringing these along on your next shopping trip. Fold them up compact and put them in your shopper bags, cute purses, clutch purse, man purse, backpack purse, or canvas bag. Each bag measures 12 x 14 inches. That’s enough room for larger produce items such as bananas, leaf lettuce, broccoli, or carrots.

♦ MULTI FUNCTIONAL ♦ - Versatile bag, great for storing travel items in carry on luggage, shoes, cosmetics, accessories, beach bags, luggage sets, summer tote bags, kids toy storage, toiletries. It’s a great alternative to plastic storage bags, and good for the environment. Washable White Nylon Mesh – Recommended hand wash and line dry.

♦ DON'T BE FOOLED BY CHEAP IMITATIONS AND FAKE REVIEWS ♦ - Why buy cheap bags made in China that will rip just to save a couple dollars? You'll end up spending more just to replace them. 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED
